column5: Hellq ladies and gents.  I Just recently received my new Genesis Pine. I was lucky to get it so quick and I am excited to use it soon.    https://picasaweb.go...gCPaphr_st7G6Xg  I'll share a pic of the first fish I catch with it.
Sweet reel for sure, your gonna love using it this fall.

Sweet reel  From the few Paine Falls reels I've been able to see on the local rivers, they feel solid and very well made. I think he made a small batch of black Apex knock-offs a couple years ago...I'd love to own one of those.LOL

Thanks everyone for the complement.  Like you said it is a such sweet piece of art thanks to Adam, I tried it (no fish yet) it works great, Very quick start up probably due to the fact that it is a 5" diameter. The clicker is super strong so no more need to use any rubber bands. I m so excited to see it in action this fall.  I'll let you know then
